captions.text:
What your parents want.
What do you want?

- What do you want?
- It's not that simple.

- What do you want?
- It's not--

Goddamn it,
what do you want?

title: The Notebook (5/6) Movie CLIP - The Best Love (2004) HD

comments.author: Gina Shallyna

comments.text:
This reminds me of a man I still love to this very day! I thought time 
would dull the heartache of his absence. It has not! We move on because 
that is what time forces us to do but in the still of the night, our 
thoughts catch up to us and we remember the spring/summer we spent learning 
from each other, and growing in love. It will never be what my heart had 
prayed it would but nonetheless, our love awakened my soul made me reach 
for more and it is because of you I have it to give to someone else. 

I still love you. I'll be seeing you!
﻿
comments.author: HeySaveMeSome

comments.text:
Such a beautiful movie/story but living it is quite a different story.... 
having to choose between what was.. or what might be. A situation I would 
never wish upon anyone.... in real life it doesnt always bring a happy 
ending. as Allie says.. Its not that simple... No matter what I do.. 
Someone gets hurt.  I dont know what I'll do... ﻿

comments.text:
"I couldn't sleep last night ... I'm not bitter anymore, because I know 
that what we had was real. And if in some distant place in the future we 
see each other in our new lives, I'll smile at you with joy and remember 
how we spent the summer beneath the trees, learning from each other and 
growing in love. The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes 
us reach for more, that plants a fire in our hearts and brings peace to our 
minds, and that's what you've given me. That's what I hope to give to you 
forever. I love you."﻿
comments.author: Stephen Stahley

comments.text:
the fact of the matter is is that I love you aNd I hAve from The very first 
moment I met you when you picked me up 7 yeArs ago. it has onLy grown 
stronger wIth Each day that passes. and it will never change. call me crazy 
but from the first day we talked, it was like we all ready knew each other. 
Everything was comfortable. it just felt right. well here I am 7 years 
later and still feel the same. it will never change. so if that time comes 
in your life when you think that I have given up or have forgotten you, 
look back on all my posts for you over the years and know that I have not 
nor will I forget you nor will I give up on the hopes and dreams of us 
being together. you have and will always be my angel. ﻿
